# Stego Challenge: Digital Cube (60 Points)

**...Strathmore leaned forward and rotated his monitor toward Susan. The screen was black except for a small, white text box blinking in the middle. TIME ELAPSED: 50:50" <br>
TRANSLTR, the single best crypto-machine, could not crack this code. Maybe you can...**

Author of this challenge gave us a txt file with lots of 1's and 0's.

```
$ cat digitalcube.txt 

```

Let's try to convert it to ASCII.

```ASCII
√ø√º√º√å√ø√ø√ø?3√ø√º√è√Ä√Ä3√∞0√è√å√è3√º√≥√≥3√å√É?<√º√è0√Ä√è√è?3√å03√≥√è√å?√å√º√≥√≥√≥?<√å?√Ä√Ä3√∞0√ø√º√å√å√è√ø√ø√ø333√ø√∞√∞√É<√∞√º<?√º?√è√è√∞?√å<√≥√å√É√ø√è√∞30√ø√≥√º√∞0√≥3√Ä√≥√º<√å√∞<√º√∞√º?√ø√É<?√º√≥√ø√Ä√º√É?√º?√Ä√Ä0√è√∞3√Ä<√ø√è√≥<√ø√∞?√≥√º√è?√º<√ø√º3√º√å√å?√ø√ø33√å3<√É3√è0√è√å√º√∞√ø√∞√≥√≥?<?√º<√º√Ä√É√É√∞??00√∞√º√è√å√Ä33√≥0√å√å√∞√º√≥3<?<√ø√º√è?03√ø√ø3√è√å
```

Okay.. I'm dead..

Let's analyze the challenge again..

So the title of the challenge is `Digital Cube` and the challenge description gave us a hint which is `TIME ELAPSED: 50:50`.

What if this challenge is some kind of ASCII ART? Right? Cube has a perfect width and height, and 50:50 is a perfect ratio.

Let's try to validate it by forming it.. Let say 50 characters per line for 50 lines..

<img src="qr-ascii.png">

Well, It looks like a QR Code!

Let's use GIMP and shade all 1's with black paint and leave all 0's as it is..

<img src="qr-readable.png">

Much better than ASCII ART of QR Code.

Let's scan this QR and get the flag.

<img src="qr.jpg">

Wee! QR is not Dead!
